title: Cifra Font
content:
Cifra is my new sans serif font available at t26.  
 [http://www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f\_id=951](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724001706/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=951 "http://www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f\_id=951")  
I would really would like to know you opinion about it. thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724001706im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cifra_6071.jpg)
author: rui abreu

comments.content: Congrats, I like it more light, the round dot fits, interesting x-height, bucolic ampersand !
